SEARCH
Package game.actors.npc.nonhostile.merchant

Interface Merchant

All Known Implementing Classes:
Kale, Sellen
public interface Merchant
An actor that can sell items/weapons to the Farmer.

The identifier returned by getMerchantId() allows all buy–actions to apply merchant-specific effects without any use of instanceof.
